text: Wilford Brimley died on Saturday at age 85. During his career, he played down his talent, describing himself as “just a guy, just a feller." “I can’t talk about acting,” he said. “I don’t know anything about it. I was just lucky enough to get hired.” https://t.co/V2Q9V6EiHI

name: nytimes
text:
How the virus spread in the U.S. in July:
—The U.S. recorded more than 1.9 million infections
—New cases in July account for nearly 42% of the total in the U.S.
—April was the previous monthly high when more than 880,000 new cases were recorded

Read more. https://t.co/MArQUW6koL https://t.co/ZppWdQPJkn
